Megatron:




Megatron laughed. "Why, my dear crustacean, a Predacon works together. And I 
doubt that Hell Beast's appointed second in command could barely manage for 
the Predacon force. But I know what to do. And perhaps Ms. Brightblade has 
abandoned you."
